</form>        </div>

</dialog></dialog-helper>

<div class="markdown-heading" dir="auto"><h3 tabindex="-1" class="heading-element" dir="auto">Breaking Changes</h3><a id="user-content-breaking-changes-5" class="anchor" aria-label="Permalink: Breaking Changes" href="#breaking-changes-5"><svg class="octicon octicon-link" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" height="16" aria-hidden="true"><path d="m7.775 3.275 1.25-1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1 4.95 4.95l-2.5 2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1-4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1 .018-1.042.751.751 0 0 1 1.042-.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l2.5-2.5a2.002 2.002 0 0 0-2.83-2.83l-1.25 1.25a.751.751 0 0 1-1.042-.018.751.751 0 0 1-.018-1.042Zm-4.69 9.64a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l1.25-1.25a.751.751 0 0 1 1.042.018.751.751 0 0 1 .018 1.042l-1.25 1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1-4.95-4.95l2.5-2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1 4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1-.018 1.042.751.751 0 0 1-1.042.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0-2.83 0l-2.5 2.5a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 0 2.83Z"></path></svg></a></div>
<ul dir="auto">
<li><code>camunda</code> namespace moddle extension is no longer part of the package.
Consider using <a href="https://github.com/camunda/camunda-dmn-js">camunda/camunda-dmn-js</a> to support Camunda Platform.</li>
<li>The input variable field is removed. Use <a href="https://github.com/camunda/camunda-dmn-js">camunda/camunda-dmn-js</a>
to support adding and modifying <code>camunda:inputVariable</code>.</li>
<li>The only expression language selectable per default is FEEL.
To change the list, pass respective ELs via <code>expressionLanguages</code>
configuration.</li>
<li>Types <code>integer</code>, <code>double</code>, and <code>long</code> have been replaced with <code>number</code>.</li>
<li>Simple edit for <code>date</code> uses now FEEL date. For FEEL <code>date and time</code>,
use <code>dateTime</code> type.</li>
</ul>

<div class="markdown-heading" dir="auto"><h3 tabindex="-1" class="heading-element" dir="auto">Breaking Changes</h3><a id="user-content-breaking-changes-9" class="anchor" aria-label="Permalink: Breaking Changes" href="#breaking-changes-9"><svg class="octicon octicon-link" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" height="16" aria-hidden="true"><path d="m7.775 3.275 1.25-1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1 4.95 4.95l-2.5 2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1-4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1 .018-1.042.751.751 0 0 1 1.042-.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l2.5-2.5a2.002 2.002 0 0 0-2.83-2.83l-1.25 1.25a.751.751 0 0 1-1.042-.018.751.751 0 0 1-.018-1.042Zm-4.69 9.64a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l1.25-1.25a.751.751 0 0 1 1.042.018.751.751 0 0 1 .018 1.042l-1.25 1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1-4.95-4.95l2.5-2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1 4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1-.018 1.042.751.751 0 0 1-1.042.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0-2.83 0l-2.5 2.5a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 0 2.83Z"></path></svg></a></div>
<ul dir="auto">
<li>Dropped DMN 1.1 support. To keep opening DMN 1.1 diagrams those must be migrated to DMN 1.3 before passing them over to the toolkit. Cf. <a href="https://bpmn.io/blog/posts/2020-dmn-js-8-0-0.html" rel="nofollow">release blog post</a>, <a href="https://github.com/bpmn-io/dmn-js-examples/tree/master/dmn-compatibility">DMN compatibility example</a>.</li>
<li>Grapical information is now stored using standardized <code>DMNDI</code> and support for the DI vendor extension is removed.</li>
<li>DI waypoints of new <code>dmn:Association</code> elements no longer point to middle of source and target and have same
coordinates as connection waypoints.</li>
<li>Renamed <code>updateProperties</code> command in <code>dmn-js-drd</code> to <code>element.updateProperties</code> to align with other libraries</li>
</ul>
<div class="markdown-heading" dir="auto"><h2 tabindex="-1" class="heading-element" dir="auto">7.5.0</h2><a id="user-content-750" class="anchor" aria-label="Permalink: 7.5.0" href="#750"><svg class="octicon octicon-link" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" height="16" aria-hidden="true"><path d="m7.775 3.275 1.25-1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1 4.95 4.95l-2.5 2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1-4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1 .018-1.042.751.751 0 0 1 1.042-.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l2.5-2.5a2.002 2.002 0 0 0-2.83-2.83l-1.25 1.25a.751.751 0 0 1-1.042-.018.751.751 0 0 1-.018-1.042Zm-4.69 9.64a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l1.25-1.25a.751.751 0 0 1 1.042.018.751.751 0 0 1 .018 1.042l-1.25 1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1-4.95-4.95l2.5-2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1 4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1-.018 1.042.751.751 0 0 1-1.042.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0-2.83 0l-2.5 2.5a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 0 2.83Z"></path></svg></a></div>
<ul dir="auto">

<div class="markdown-heading" dir="auto"><h3 tabindex="-1" class="heading-element" dir="auto">Breaking Changes</h3><a id="user-content-breaking-changes-10" class="anchor" aria-label="Permalink: Breaking Changes" href="#breaking-changes-10"><svg class="octicon octicon-link" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" height="16" aria-hidden="true"><path d="m7.775 3.275 1.25-1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1 4.95 4.95l-2.5 2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1-4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1 .018-1.042.751.751 0 0 1 1.042-.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l2.5-2.5a2.002 2.002 0 0 0-2.83-2.83l-1.25 1.25a.751.751 0 0 1-1.042-.018.751.751 0 0 1-.018-1.042Zm-4.69 9.64a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l1.25-1.25a.751.751 0 0 1 1.042.018.751.751 0 0 1 .018 1.042l-1.25 1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1-4.95-4.95l2.5-2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1 4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1-.018 1.042.751.751 0 0 1-1.042.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0-2.83 0l-2.5 2.5a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 0 2.83Z"></path></svg></a></div>
<ul dir="auto">
<li>Dropped DMN 1.1 support. Migration to DMN 1.3 necessary (c.f. <a href="https://github.com/bpmn-io/dmn-migrate">@bpmn-io/dmn-migrate</a>).</li>
<li><code>DrdFactory</code> uses <code>dmndi</code> namespace instead of <code>biodi</code>.</li>
<li>DI waypoints of new dmn:Association no longer point to middle of source and target and have same
coordinates as connection waypoints.</li>
</ul>

</ul>
